title: XiangJi Ge Vegetarian
description: A casual-nice vegetarian restaurant offering traditional Chinese cuisine but inspired through contemporary trends. Dishes are mostly vegan with extensive selections in savories plus has sweet desserts, large selection of teas. Picture menu with English translations available. Located in the KaiXin Center, out of exit 2 at West Nanjing Rd Line 2 metro station, at 南京西路819号, 开欣商厦410室. Since May 2014.
streetAddress: 819 West Nanjing Rd, KaiXin Center, 4th Floor
